name: Hate Thy Neighbour
overview: With the far-right on the rise in the UK, US and Europe, comedian Jamali Maddix goes on a tour to confront groups spreading hate across the world. Yet this is no ordinary survey of the state of hate, but a genuine attempt by our disarmingly charming and intrepid host to befriend those groups and understand why they think the way they do.

seasons.name: Season
seasons.overview: Jamali spends time with hate preacher Ruben Israel and his fundamentalist disciples as they attempt to disrupt the New Orleans "Southern Decadence" festival.

episodes.name: Forbidden Love in Israel
episodes.overview: Jamali takes a trip to the Holy Land to meet the Lehava, the anti-assimilation group trying to prevent Arabs and Jews from marrying.

episodes.name: Hunting the White Devil
episodes.overview: amali travels to Harlem, where he meets black separatists who believe they are descendants of the Twelve Tribes of Israel.

episodes.name: Football, Fascists & the Frontline
episodes.overview: Ukraine is the only country in Europe fighting a war on its own soil. Jamali meets with Azov, a far-right militant group that has gained legitimacy despite its neo-Nazi roots.

episodes.name: America's Far White
episodes.overview: In the series premiere, Jamali meets members of the Nationalist Socialist Movement, the largest neo-Nazi group in the U.S.

episodes.name: Britain's Everyday Extremism
episodes.overview: Jamali comes home to Britain to confront its most deep-rooted fears about the future of the country and Britain's acceptance of multiculturalism and racism in the shadow of Brexit.

episodes.name: Sweden's Far Right Youth
episodes.overview: Jamali embeds himself in the Nordic Youth, who patrol Sweden's streets hunting refugees, to try to understand their response to this global crisis.

episodes.name: Love and Hate in the Deep South
episodes.overview: Jamali spends time with hate preacher Ruben Israel and his fundamentalist disciples as they attempt to disrupt the New Orleans "Southern Decadence" festival.

episodes.name: The Fight Over Free Speech
episodes.overview: Jamali hangs out with conservative students as tensions on campus rise during UC Berkeley's "Free Speech Week."

episodes.name: Prison Camp for Kids
episodes.overview: Jamali travels to South Carolina to spend the weekend with a group of kids enrolled in a "correctional weekend" that promises to deter kids from a life of crime.

episodes.name: Pro-Lifers
episodes.overview: With the abortion debate reignited, Jamali spends time with two passionate but very different pro-life preachers.

episodes.name: Black Rebel
episodes.overview: Jamali explores the highly charged issue surrounding the Confederate Flag with guidance from an unlikely champion, "The Black Rebel."

episodes.name: The White House Preacher
episodes.overview: Jamali heads to South Carolina to work out how pastor Mark Burns went from small town preacher to a member of President Trump's Evangelical Advisory Board.

episodes.name: Border Vigilantes
episodes.overview: Jamali spends time with two vigilante groups intent on protecting the border between Mexico and the USA.

episodes.name: Feminism 101
episodes.overview: With people talking more than ever before about women's rights Jamali investigates what it means to be a third wave, second wave and anti-feminist.

episodes.name: United States of Oil and Gas
episodes.overview: Jamali tries to understand both sides of an oil and gas debate in Oklahoma.
